my_likes: Ngaahi Meʻa ʻoku Ou Saiʻia aí
liked_memories: Ngaahi Manatu Melie Ne u Saiʻia aí
memories_desc: Ko hano fakatahatahaʻi ʻeni ʻo e ngaahi manatu melie kuó ke tokoni mai ʻaí, tukukehe e ngaahi manatu melie naʻe ʻave ki Heʻeku ʻĀkaiví.
favorites_desc: Ko hano fakatahatahaʻi ʻeni ha ngaahi manatu melie kuó ke manako aí ʻi hoʻo lomiʻi ʻi he fakaʻilonga haati ʻi he peesi manatu melié.
likes_desc: Ko hano fakatahataha‘i ʻeni ʻo e ngaahi manatu melie kuó ke saiʻia aí ʻi hoʻo lomiʻi ʻi he fakaʻilonga haati ʻi he peesi ʻo e manatu melié.
bookmarks_desc: Ko hano fakatahatahaʻi ʻeni ʻo ha ngaahi manatu melie naʻá ke fakaʻilongaʻí, ʻaki hono lomiʻi ʻo e fakaʻilonga bookmark (fakaʻilongá).
archive_desc: Te ke lava ʻo ʻomi ki heni ʻa e ngaahi manatu melie ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai te ke toe fie maʻu ke ke sio ki ai ʻi he Ko ʻEku Ngaahi Manatu Melié.
deleted_desc: Ko ha fakatahatahaʻi ʻeni ʻo ha ngaahi manatu melie naʻá ke toki tamateʻi.
